def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    
    Thought 2: To capture the balance of weights, we can use the ratio of Left-Weight to Right-Weight and vice versa.
    New Features 2 & 3: left_to_right_ratio, right_to_left_ratio | 
                       left_to_right_ratio = (Left-Weight / Right-Weight) if Right-Weight != 0 else float('inf')
                       right_to_left_ratio = (Right-Weight / Left-Weight) if Left-Weight != 0 else float('inf')
    
    Thought 3: The absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance can capture the imbalance in distance distribution.
    New Feature 4: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Distance)
    
    Thought 4: To capture the balance of distances, we can use the ratio of Left-Distance to Right-Distance and vice versa.
    New Features 5 & 6: left_to_right_distance_ratio, right_to_left_distance_ratio | 
                       left_to_right_distance_ratio = (Left-Distance / Right-Distance) if Right-Distance != 0 else float('inf')
                       right_to_left_distance_ratio = (Right-Distance / Left-Distance) if Left-Distance != 0 else float('inf')
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate the ratio of Left-Weight to Right-Weight
    df_output['left_to_right_ratio'] = (df_output['Left-Weight'] / df_output['Right-Weight']) if df_output['Right-Weight'] != 0 else float('inf')
    
    # Calculate the ratio of Right-Weight to Left-Weight
    df_output['right_to_left_ratio'] = (df_output['Right-Weight'] / df_output['Left-Weight']) if df_output['Left-Weight'] != 0 else float('inf')
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference']
